title: [SOLVED]820-3332 no image on both internal and external monitors
message:
Hi,

I have another 820-3332 board in for repair. According to the customer, this one started slowly dying out on him about a year ago.
Every 15 minutes or so image disappears and sometimes the machine will restart and give a GPU panic error. Sometimes there is no image on boot at all. No image on external monitor.
L9000 and PPVCORE_GPU are 0V when no image.

Please advice how to proceed.

Thanks!

title: [SOLVED]820-3332 no image on both internal and external monitors
[SOLVED]820-3332 no image on both internal and external monitors
message:
Holy macaroni it worked! Checked that bastard under microscope and it looked nice and shiny with no damage. Resoldered it and it works like a charm now. Tested with full ASD test and 2 hours on donut test (Furmark).

Unbelievable....
